name: Witch's dices run
description:
You stole the dices of the witch, now she is trying to take them back.

Those dices will transform you into a random creature every now and then.

Controls:

[Arrow keys] Move / Fly / Jump

[Space] Attack

[Escape] Quit

Musics :

Menu :  Happy Times 8-bit by Ayrayen

Game: TheChase Chiptune by Ef-x
